title: Unpacking Your Financial Feels Ft. Shani Tran
description:
Berna is back to check in about our financial feels. She shares her own financial journey and how her relationship with money has changed throughout the years. Then she’s joined by financial therapist Shani Tran to talk about how financial trauma, which you’ve probably experienced, can shape our relationship to money in all aspects of our lives. They tell us how to work through those issues to make sure you don’t let money doesn’t rule your life. Finally, we close out the show with the Public Forum, brought to you by Public.com, featuring listener-submitted questions all about financial feels. Be sure to follow us @whenshappyhr to send in your questions to be answered on the Public Forum!
Thanks to our presenting sponsor Public.com! Visit public.com/betches to sign up and get started today.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
